description.raw:
* Attempt to implement multiple connection attempts and web server restart on the rfBlaster. This requires respawning netcat upon each connection. Standalone test script in RFBlaster\_kloned.py. New method restart\_kloned called by all methods that make urllib2.urlopen calls; transition\_to\_buffered, check\_remote\_values, & program\_manual. A fair bit of boilerplate here, with the only thing differing being the actual request.
* RFBlaster changes:

    * Use logging from labscript\_utils.
    * Fix global import of socket in **init**.
    * Fix attempt to netcat using self.address, which had protocol prefix and port.
    * Fixed reconnect loop \(while should only be conditional on whether it worked\).
    * Reset connection attempts after successful kloned restart over netcat.
    
* RFBlaster: Better handling of socket errors, and logging specific exceptions.

‌
